entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Assiniboia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Assiniboia Airport 11:00 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
Temperature: -15.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -17.6°C
Wind: E 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Fog. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Fog dissipating. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating late in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming west 30 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
